title: My account has been hacked
body:
I recently found out my account has been hacked and the last time I log in was 18th April and I have not bind with my email.
What should I do now?

replies.body:
Submit an account recovery ticket to player support while logged out of the support site and with a different email than you have used for any League stuff in the past.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
